meanings.definition: To remove a hyperlink from a webpage.
meanings.sent1: She delinks the website to update the information.
meanings.sent2: Remember to delinks any outdated links on the page.
meanings.sent3: The webpage felt relieved after she delinks the broken link.
meanings.sent4: He delinks the old connections like cutting a rope.
meanings.sent5: Delinks the hyperlink carefully to avoid any mistakes.

meanings.definition: To disconnect or separate links between two things.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic delinks the chains to fix the machine.
meanings.sent2: It is important to delinks the pipes before moving the equipment.
meanings.sent3: The robot accidentally delinks its arms while trying to dance.
meanings.sent4: She delinks the friendship between them with a simple conversation.
meanings.sent5: Delinks the wires gently to prevent any damage.
